title: Trapped and Alone (3U72)
text:
Set:	Realms of the Elf-lords
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Isengard
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	Plays to your support area. Each character skirmishing an [Isengard] Orc loses all damage bonuses from weapons.
Lore:	”'…I had no chance of escape, and my days were bitter.'”
Rarity:	U
